title: Mia Chloe
author: Mia Chloe
content: After a long and busy day I decided to make  this post I have been longing to make for quite a while now only for me  to proceed surfing the forum and discover we had lost a hero on this forum recently. Since I am quite good at poem writing and although I never really knew "light_warrior" I real life I decided to  write a Eulogy as my way of saying goodbye slept of though  but was able to complete it .Here it goes;EULOGY for the forumThis eulogy I write for light_warrior to BitcointalkOh light_ warrior of blessed memoriesa Bitcoin supporter scrolling through the asile of life's ledger with cryptographic mighta story decentralized a journey adventurous has come to an end on his digital scroll.Oh light_warrior amidst the sorrow respect encrypteda symphony of cryptography, forever scriptedA just member who ran the race over scamsa hero whose face time can't erase.Oh light_warrior a Bitcoin talk hero oh light_warrior a decentralized soul a spirit encrypted soaring the crypto breeze now put to rest with proper praise.Oh light_warrior  a warrior indeed without fright his light shone bright scams and hacks fleeA lee indeed for we kneel in respect as his lights go out.EULOGY for the familyThis eulogy I write for light_warrior to the familyWith heavy hearts we give last respect to our brother light_warrior With heavy hearts we bid farewell to a soul remarkablea soul of able kindness ,an unwavering spirit a blessing indeed he was.Blue we not be as we bid this soul good byeTrue his memories a gentle life's celebration indeed oh a friend indeedIn all challenges faced a man who stood tall in gracea soul resilient through his lengths of life In ink his name the letters of "BRAVERY"Though we bid goodbye as light_warrior lays to rest his race holds a record unwavering in our heartA soul nice and kind has come to stay In our hearts a soul now free of life in the tapestry of his existence.From an anonymous friend to light_warriorMia

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Should every user need to open a new thread to give his condolences to light_warrior? no offense, just asking.

comments.author: AirtelBuzz
comments.body: In the meantime, @icopress has opened a thread where you can express your condolences and donate to his family.this post You may have been more saddened and emotional by his death that you opened this thread anew.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on December 09, 2023, 04:02:06 AMShould every user need to open a new thread to give his condolences to light_warrior? no offense, just asking.I am not too much into poetry but the poem seems nice to me and the truth is that it has a much better exposition here than on page 7 of the condolences thread.I think you are right, however, that when one dies this section should not be filled with threads as competing with the main condolences thread, and hopefully this will not happen.Therefore, I would recommend the OP to lock the thread, because it seems to me that he will continue to receive more criticism for opening a parallel thread than for having written a poem to the deceased.
